name: clarion-app/wizlight-backend
description: Provides operations to control Wiz light bulbs.

clarion.description: Provides operations to control Wiz light bulbs.

customPrompts.chooseOperations: To adjust the lighting of a room, first use room.index to retrieve a list of rooms with room IDs and names. Find the ID that matches the requested room name. Then, use room.update to modify the state of the room. To adjust the lighting of a single bulb in a room, first use room.index to retrieve a list of rooms with room IDs and names. Then use bulb.update with the appropriate bulb id to modify the state of the bulb. These will require the 'continue' parameter to be set when calling generate_api_call.
customPrompts.generateApiCall: When adjusting the lighting, you must include the 'dimming' property in the body of the HTTP call.
